participant_1.background:
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
i love video games.
Music is an important part of my life, and I love to listen to it when I'm working, relaxing, or just hanging out.
i like thomas the tank engine.
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

participant_2.background:
I am a mystery buff and live in London.
I am not rich, but I am fortunate enough to have parents who support my passion for filmmaking.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
I have a collection of rocks and minerals from all over the world.
I wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.

content.text: Hi, my name is Ryan. I'm a mystery buff and I love watching YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
Hi Ryan, my name is Sarah. I'm from London and I'm a mystery buff too! I love reading detective novels and watching true crime documentaries.
That's awesome! I'm glad to meet another mystery buff. Do you have any favorite mystery novels or documentaries?
Yes, I love the Sherlock Holmes series by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. I also really enjoyed the documentary series The Jinx.
I've heard great things about Sherlock Holmes. I'll have to check it out. I've also heard good things about The Jinx.
Do you have any other hobbies besides watching YouTube videos of other people barbecuing?
Yes, I love playing video games and listening to music.
That's cool. I used to play video games a lot when I was younger, but I don't have much time for them anymore.
I understand. I wish I had more time to play video games, but I have to work full-time and I also have a lot of other hobbies.
That's understandable. I'm glad you have a lot of hobbies that you enjoy.
It was nice to meet you, Ryan.
It was nice to meet you too, Sarah.
